Welcome to **BCG Fish**, your source for **fresh fish** from Tokwe Mukosi.  
All fish are priced at **$4.50 per kg**. Contact me via WhatsApp to place your order.

```{r}

```


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| results: asis

for(i in 1:nrow(fish)){
  # Fish name and price
  cat("### ", fish$Name[i], " ‚Äì $", fish$Price[i], " per kg\n\n", sep = "")
  
  # Fish image
  cat("![](", fish$ImageURL[i], "){width=200}\n\n", sep = "")
  
  # WhatsApp button
  whatsapp_link <- paste0(
    "https://wa.me/", 
    gsub("\\+", "", whatsapp_number),
    "?text=", URLencode(fish$WhatsAppText[i])
  )
  
  cat("[Order on WhatsApp](", whatsapp_link, 
      "){.btn .btn-success target=\"_blank\"}\n\n", sep = "")
}

```
